rows.label: qst003101_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm a bit tied up right now. Could this
wait till I'm done, you reckon?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0002
rows.name:
Things are really not great here,
to be honest. The distribution centers
have been a total mess lately.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0003
rows.name:
We're pinched for resources as it is.
And now we've got all these Acedian
refugees flooding in...

rows.label: qst003101_msg0004
rows.name:
The civilians here in Invidia are getting
pretty cranky with us soldiers, too.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a real mess. We should be helping
each other, not biting each other's
heads off...

rows.label: qst003101_msg0006
rows.name:
It's a big blow for everyone here...
For the refugees, and for the folks
who were here before.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0007
rows.name:
There are three distribution centers
here in Fons Maim, and all of them
are running into problems right now.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0008
rows.name:
We'd be all right if we just had more
support. But right now, it's taking all we
have just to cope with our own issues.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0009
rows.name:
You guys reckon you could lend a
hand, do ya?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0010
rows.name:
If you could help us out, it'd give us a
little breathing space to get a handle
on things.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0011
rows.name:
Maybe we could do something to get
the civilians to calm down a bit.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0012
rows.name:
We're a bit short on food supplies here.
That'd be our first request, I imagine...
Think you'd be up for helping out?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0013
rows.name: Thanks a bunch.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0014
rows.name:
Like I've said before, there are three
distribution centers in total.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0015
rows.name:
There's this one, and the one at
Gwendle Repair Dock, and then
one more in Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0016
rows.name:
Each has its own problems, so you'll
have to talk to the guys in charge
separately. For us, it's Velmo here.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0017
rows.name:
I owe you one. We can't give you much
in return, but we're counting on you!

rows.label: qst003101_msg0101
rows.name:
So can you help out with our
distribution operation?

rows.label: qst003101_msg0102
rows.name:
The distribution centers are found
here, in Gwendle Repair Dock, and
Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst003101_msg0103
rows.name: We're counting on you.
